name: recommend
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool optlog_co_optimize_anything.
Tool description: OptLog is a software suite for a black-box global optimization engine for real-world metric optimization. The main advantage of OptLog is scalability, simplicity and continuity of serving. A function can be optimised at any time with any parameters without worrying about the optimizer state - OptLog does it for you!
API description: Fetches a recommendation for a given experiment ID using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

experiment_id.description: The ID of the experiment for which to fetch recommendations.
